def has_remote_been_visited(remote_control:item):
    # Check if the remote control has been visited
    symbol has_been_visited=visited(remote_control)
    return has_been_visited

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists remote_control: item : is_remote_control(remote_control) and has_remote_been_visit
ed(remote_control):
            # If we already know where the remote control is, approach it
            bind remote_control: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote_control) and has_remote_been_visited(remote_control)
            achieve close_char(char, remote_control)

        else:
            # If we havent found the remote control yet, search for it
            foreach remote_control: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote_control) and not visited(remote_control):
                    observe(remote_control, "Check if this is the remote control")

        achieve visited(remote_control)
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        achieve visited(television)
        achieve close_char(char, television)
        assert has_switch(remote_control)
        assert is_off(television)
        touch(remote_control)

        achieve is_on(tv)
